title: Profit Table Receive
description: A summary of account profit table is received

count.description: Number of transactions returned in this call

transaction_id.description: It is the transaction id. every contract (buy or sell) and every payment has a unique id. Example: 10867502908

contract_id.description: It is the contract id Example: 4867502908

purchase_time.description: It is the purchase time of transaction

sell_time.description: It is the sell time of transaction

longcode.description: The description of contract purchased if description is set to 1

shortcode.description: Compact description of the contract purchased if description is set to 1

req_id.description: Optional field send in request to map to response, present only when request contains req_id
